edx.Selection in tooltip: Move highlight selection to cursor elements
edx.Stop selection in tooltip: Move highlight selection out of cursor elements
edx.Move cursor left: Move plot cursor one bin to the left
edx.Move cursor right: Move plot cursor one bin to the right
edx.Clear highlight and cursor: Clear element highlight, clear plot cursor

scan.Show radial: Show radial menu with quick actions around cursor

compare.Move comparison left: In split comparison, move split to the left
compare.Move comparison left fine: In split comparison, move split a little to the left
compare.Move comparison right: In split comparison, move split to the right
compare.Move comparison right fine: In split comparison, move split a little to the right
compare.Increase opacity: In opacity comparison, increase opacity of the top image
compare.Increase opacity fine: In opacity comparison, increase opacity of the top image a small amount
compare.Decrease opacity: In opacity comparison, decrease opacity of the top image
compare.Decrease opacity fine: In opacity comparison, decrease opacity of the top image a small amount
compare.Stop compare: Stop comparing and return to overview

annotate.Stop annotation: Cancel current annotation or stop annotating if no annotation is active
